title: No daily missions?
body:
Hi guys,

I haven't received any daily missions, i have been on holiday so am unsure if they are discontinued or what? can anyone let me know whats going on?

If they are still happening then can you let me know how to access them?

Thanks

replies.body: The only missions currently active are the ones associated with Kayn. They'll only be available if you currently own him, but once he hits his free to play week then everyone should have access to those 2 missions.
